Haball Haball Mobile App is a one window solution to manage business to business transactions and enable process optimization from ordering digitally to making payments easily. Forgot Password Please enter your registered email address to reset your password Dashboard Payment Options Update Save Close Following are the steps to use Internet/Mobile Bankings for making payments: Following are the steps to make payments over the counter: Following are the steps to make payments over the counter: * User shall login the online banking portal (web or mobile app) * User would be required to move to the biller section where “Haball” will be displayed as a biller. * User would be required to enter the Payment ID generated by benefeciary a name. * By entering PSID, the payment details shall be fetched, including payment amount and beneficiary (company to whom payment is being made). * Upon confirmation, the bank account of the user will be debited and distributor portal would be updated accordingly. * User should visit bank teller of his/her bank. * User will fill out the deposit slip mentioning cheque/instrument number and PS-ID and give it to the bank teller and ask him to process payment. * By entering PSID, details would be displayed to bank teller, including bill amount. Teller would request cash from the user. * Once payment is received by teller, transaction would be initiated where bill would be paid. Haball would update distributor portal in real-time and email alerts would be generated instantly * User will keep the bank-stamped copy of the deposit slip for uploading in Haball portal as proof of payment * User shall visit the bank’s ATM. User would enter their card and login the ATM with their pin. * The user would be required to enter the consumer number. Over here, user would need to input the 14-digit Payment ID generated by Haball. * By entering PSID, the payment details shall be visible to the user, including the bill amount. * User will keep the payment-reciept from ATM as proof of payment.
